Label.en: Does politics interest you much, by the way?

Label.en: Well, I think kitten politics will...

Label.en: Raymond had many kitten enemies imprisoned, and they are awaiting trial...

Label.en: What would you do with them?

Label.en: Wow... not even I, Swagfish the kitten-hater, would be as harsh!
